reviews.positive_text: Nice hotel on the port. Comfortable bed
reviews.negative_text:
We booked a superior room (double bed and sofa bed) for 2 adults and a 4 year old. I prepaid the cost of ‚Ç¨210 for the room.
However, at check out they asked us for an additional ‚Ç¨25 for the additional bed for the child. We explained that the reservation was for 3 and that the room already included the sofa bed. Furthermore, on Booking it was specified that the 4 year old child would stay for free without extra costs. If I buy a room for 3 people, the beds must be 3. However, the lady at the reception with an aggressive and unladylike tone insisted on payment.
In the end we refused to pay the supplement compared to what was already paid and in accordance with the reservation and they "invited" us to take our luggage back, thus forcing us to have to take the ferry earlier to leave the island.
Other defects, very small superior room, the view of the roofs is on a wall, unheated swimming pool and paid breakfast at 17 euros.
Not worth the cost.

Ps Before leaving I had advised that we would also be traveling with a 0 year old baby and they replied that the cost for an additional cot was ‚Ç¨15, which with their indulgence, we did not purchase because he sleeps in the bed.

reviews.negative_text: Helaas een onpersoonlijke ontvangst. Niemand bij de receptie.

reviews.positive_text: Situato immediatamente sul porto dell'isola di Groix permette di raggiungere facilmente a piedi il borgo. Non abbiamo preso la colazione. Permettono di lasciare i bagagli sia prima della pulizia della camera sia al check out. L'isola √® fantastica e vale la pena di vistarla (noi l'abbiamo girata con la nostra auto ma vi sono noleggi per bici e auto elettriche).
reviews.negative_text: L'Hotel non ha parcheggio interno e non sempre si trova posto al vicino parcheggio sovrastante. Letto un po' piccolo e bagno senza bidet.
